chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following problem:
The delivery company tells me I'll be delivered on the 27th, which is out of question, I ordered to be delivered between the 23rd and 24th, I haven't had a phone for over a week now, I want a refund or compensation in this case !!!!!

Thank you for your help,

Hello,
My iPhone 12 is having a problem as follows:
I want a refund, I won't wait until next week!
Thank you for your help,

Hello,
My iPhone 12 has the following problem:
How do you call someone? It's crazy, I pay $400 for something and I have zero assistance??
Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

The parcel for this order has still not been delivered to the customer, he contacted the carrier, but they did not give him any news, following the situation, I invite you to contact your carrier to ask them to deliver the parcel to the customer as soon as possible.

Thank you for your cooperation.
Anaissah Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The parcel will be delivered tomorrow according to the courier. 

Regards,
RK

Hi ecomobile,

On n'arrive plus à suivre le colis pour cette commande, nous allons donc demander les documents nécessaires au client afin que vous puissiez faire une enquête.

Entretemps, merci de nous donner un lien de suivi valide afin de voir la date de dernière mise à jour.

Merci votre collaboration.

  Bien à vous, 
Anaïssah, Service client Back Market

Dear Backcare,

The parcel is still in transit, the tracking link shows that the delivery had been rescheduled. We have informed our logistics partner about this situation and would get back to you when we receive a reply. 

The tracking link is https://trace.dpd.fr/trace/10694000287453.

Regards,
SY

Dear Backcare,

Please find the tracking link here https://trace.dpd.fr/trace/10694000287453

The parcel is currently being delivered.

Regards,
KJ

Hello,
My iPhone 12 is experiencing the issue above.
Thank you for your help,

Hello,
My iPhone 12 is experiencing the issue above.
Thank you for your help,

Hello! 

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Here are the documents. Please proceed with the refund after 24 working hours.

Best regards,
Pacome - Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

Kindly provide a *handwritten* CND including the IMEI of the device.

Regards,
JH

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD. If the customer wishes to contest, kindly send us the necessary documents. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello!

You have already received all the documents. Note that you have this day to do the necessary.

Best regards,
Pacome - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

As mentioned, the CND enclosed is invalid because it is not HANDWRITTEN. Could we kindly request your cooperation in providing a HANDWRITTEN CND, as required by our logistics partner? We greatly appreciate your assistance in this matter.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile!

That the docuement is filled in by hand or machine does not change anything. However, the necessary information for your complaint is well informed. The period of investigation is exceeded, we proceed to the refund. Thank you to refer to the SSC for your claim.

Best regards,
Pacome - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

It is essential that the customer fills out the document by hand on physical paper and provides their signature. This measure is necessary to ensure the carrier's acceptance, as they have expressed concerns about potential fraud with digitally generated CNDs. Handwritten documentation on paper offers greater security against forgery. 

Furthermore, the courier also requires the CND from DPD. Attached is the template.

Do not refund customers before we have confirmed that all necessary documents have been received.

Regards,
RK

Hello ecomobile, 

Please kindly refer to the Seller Support Centre (SSC) if you would like further clarification on this topic. You should easily find the answers to your questions there. Just click on this link and you will be taken to the home page of your help centre: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/login

Under "Top categories" select the category that fits your issue and an article has most likely already been written on this topic. If the help centre articles do not provide you the answers you were looking for, you can directly reach out to your SSC team by clicking on "Submit a new request" and you will receive an answer within 24 working hours. Click on this link to be redirected to the form: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/submit-new-request

You can monitor your requests by clicking on the tab "My existing requests".

*** Reminder: If this is the first time you go to the SSC, you must create a new account as this is a separate platform. You can use the same credentials as your Back Office, if you want, or different ones if you prefer.

We hope this helps!
Have a lovely day!

Pacome from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

It is essential that the customer fills out the document by hand on physical paper and provides their signature. This measure is necessary to ensure the carrier's acceptance, as they have expressed concerns about potential fraud with digitally generated CNDs. Handwritten documentation on paper offers greater security against forgery. If you have any further inquiries or require additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out. 

Furthermore, the courier also requires the CND from DPD. Without this CND, we are unable to proceed with the investigation

Regards,
JH
